title: Blinking problem
body: I have Asus laptop and every time when i start lol and loading screen with champions comes on, my laptop's screen starts blinking...i think its problem with graphic card but when i turn on other games (gta iv, farming simulator) screen is not blinking...i played lol on that laptop 2-3 years but this problem never happends before...pls help me and sorry for bad english

replies.body:
It sounds like League may be having some issues properly communicating with your Display Card (GPU). This could be caused for any number of different reasons, however, the most likely are Display Driver or Hardware issues. Our [**Framerate Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) will walk you through the most common steps to resolve this.

Hit me up if you encounter further issues.
Does any of these steps on Framerate Guide can damage my laptop or its 100% safe?

It's 100% safe, friend! 

If you run into any issues, please let me know.
